img_above_text:
![Chapter 4 Secret Area \(7\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5c/Chapter_4_Secret_Area_%287%29.png)
In the next room, continue on past the archer, and through the opening in the rocks on the right. You'll be immediately met with a giant mass of web, where you'll want to go left and continue following the path where the white sacs are.
img_below_text:
Pass through here to enter a bigger room, with a set of stairs leading up to the next level. Go up here and follow the winding path along the right.
![Chapter 4 Secret Area \(5\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/be/Chapter_4_Secret_Area_%285%29.png)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Chapter 4 Secret Area \(7\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5c/Chapter_4_Secret_Area_%287%29.png)
In the next room, continue on past the archer, and through the opening in the rocks on the right. You'll be immediately met with a giant mass of web, where you'll want to go left and continue following the path where the white sacs are."
        - Following Text: "Pass through here to enter a bigger room, with a set of stairs leading up to the next level. Go up here and follow the winding path along the right.
![Chapter 4 Secret Area \(5\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/be/Chapter_4_Secret_Area_%285%29.png)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a dark, cavernous area with a rocky path illuminated by dim lighting. A red arrow points toward an opening in the rocks on the right, guiding the player to proceed in that direction. The scene includes environmental details such as hanging chains, suspended objects, and web-like structures, aligning with the walkthrough's description of navigating past an archer and entering a web-filled area. This serves as a visual cue for progressing through the "Chapter 4 Secret Area" in the game.
